album.strDescriptionEN:
Where Our Love Grows is the eighth studio album by the British pop-smooth jazz group Swing Out Sister. The album was released in 2004 and was produced by Paul Staveley O'Duffy.

On this album, group members Andy Connell and Corinne Drewery continued in their customary roles, with Drewery on lead and backing vocals and Connell providing instruments including piano, organ, vibraphone, Fender bass, keyboards and synthesizers. Other contributing musicians include Tim Cansfield and Matt Backer on guitars, Nigel Hitchcock on saxophone and Luis Jardim on percussion. Other backing vocals were sung by Connell, O'Duffy, Gina Foster and Gersende Giorgio.
